actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A resolution to postpone the implementation of the enforcement provisions of the Surface Mine Control and Reclamation Act of 1977, Pub. L. 95-87 for a period of six months.

summary.text: Postpones for six months the implementation of the enforcement provisions of the Surface Mine Control and Reclamation Act of 1977.

titles.title: A resolution to postpone the implementation of the enforcement provisions of the Surface Mine Control and Reclamation Act of 1977, Pub. L. 95-87 for a period of six months.
